```{r include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(pander)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}

# t <- data.frame(image = c( "./images/people/katharina_zarnack.png") %>% pander::pandoc.image.return(), name = c("kathi"))

#pander(t, col.names = NULL) 


tbl_img <- data.frame(
     logo = "",
  name = c( cat("**Kathi Zarnack** \n \n 
            Group leader")))


tbl_img %>%
  kbl(booktabs = T, col.names = NULL) %>%
  kable_paper(full_width = T) %>%
  column_spec(1, image = "./images/people/katharina_zarnack.png") %>%
    column_spec(2, width = "20em")  %>%
  kable_styling(font_size = 20)

```
